titles.title: Turn My Heart, O Lord, Like Rivers Of Water

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Turn my heart, Oh Lord, like rivers of water.
Turn my heart, Oh Lord, by your hand,
Till my whole life flows in the river of your spirit,
And my name brings honour to the Lamb.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, I surrender to Your work in me;
I place my life within Your loving hands.
